original_title: Ni d'Ève, ni d'Adam. Une histoire intersexe
overview: How can you live with a gender that was decided for you, operated since birth to conform to norms? M would like to break free and begins for the first time a correspondence with 25 years-old Deborah, also born intersex. Through their letters and encounters, Deborah and M share their experiences.
title: No Box for Me: An Intersex Story
